text: Andrey A. Guryev Jr. is a Russian businessman, the CEO of PhosAgro, one of the four largest producers of phosphate-based fertilizers in the world. ==Early life== He is the son of Andrey Guryev and Evgenia. ==Career== In 2011, the Guryev family owned 71% of PhosAgro, with 10% owned by Vladimir Litvinenko. In May 2015, Forbes estimated his father's net worth at US$3.8 billion. ==Personal life== He is married to Valeria, who was educated at the London College of Fashion. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Russian chief executives Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Andrey Guryev Jr.
